member.name: T:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrText
member.summary: Contains one text item that is obtained after a Hawaii OCR call.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrText.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the OcrText class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrText.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets the orientation of the text.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrText.Skew
member.summary: Gets or sets the skewness of the text.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrText.Words
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of words that are contained in the text.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrText.Text
member.summary: Gets the text of all the words (this.Words) separated by space and combined in a single string.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrWord
member.summary: Contains one word item that is obtained after a Hawaii OCR call.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrWord.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the OcrWord class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrWord.ToString
member.summary: Returns a System.String that represents this OcrWord instance.
member.returns: A System.String that represents this OcrWord instance.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrWord.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the word.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrWord.Confidence
member.summary: Gets or sets the confidence of the word.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrWord.Box
member.summary: Gets or sets the bounding box of the word in a string format. The box is described as X0,Y0,Width,Height. X0,Y0 are the coordinates of the top left corner of the word relative to the top left corner of the image.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrResult
member.summary: This class describes the result obtained after a Hawaii OCR call.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrResult.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the OcrResult class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrResult.InternalErrorMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message if an error occures during the OCR process.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrResult.OcrTexts
member.summary: Gets or sets OcrTexts items.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrService
member.summary: Helper class that provides access to the OCR service.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrService.DefaultHostName
member.summary: Specifies the default service host name. This will be used to create the service url.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrService.ServiceSignature
member.summary: Specifies a signature for the REST method that executes the OCR processing.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrService.stagingConfigFileName
member.summary: The name of the config file that indicates where the Ocr staging service is located. Used only as a test hook.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrService.hostName
member.summary: The service host name. This is the private variable that is initialized on first access via the GetHostName() method. If a config file is present to point to a staging server, that host will be stored. Otherwise, the default is used.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrService.serviceScope
member.summary: The service scope. This is the private variable that is initialized on first access via the ServiceScope get accessor. If a config file is present to point to a staging server, that host will be stored. Otherwise, the default is used.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrService.RecognizeImageAsync(System.String,System.Byte[],Microsoft.Hawaii.ServiceAgent{Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrServiceResult}.OnCompleteDelegate,System.Object)
member.summary: Helper method to recognize an image.
member.param: Specifies a buffer containing an image that has to be processed. The image must be in JPEG format.
Specifies an on complete callback method.
Specifies a user defined object which will be provided in the call of the callback method.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrService.RecognizeImageAsync(Microsoft.Hawaii.ClientIdentity,System.Byte[],Microsoft.Hawaii.ServiceAgent{Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrServiceResult}.OnCompleteDelegate,System.Object)
member.summary: Helper method to recognize an image.
member.param: Specifies a buffer containing an image that has to be processed. The image must be in JPEG format.
Specifies an on complete callback method.
Specifies a user defined object which will be provided in the call of the callback method.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrService.GetHostName
member.summary: Returns the Host Name to be used when accessing the service. This will generally be the value specified in the DefaultHostName, but it can conditionally be set with the presence of a config file on first access.
member.returns: A string containing the host name of the service

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrService.HostName
member.summary: Gets the Host Name to be used when accessing the service.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrService.ServiceScope
member.summary: Gets the service scope to be used when accessing the adm OAuth service.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrServiceResult
member.summary: This class represents the result of the OCR processing.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrServiceResult.OcrResult
member.summary: Gets the result of the OCR processing.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrAgent
member.summary: This class provides helper methods used to communicate with the Hawaii OCR Service. for character recognition. This class accepts an image buffer as an input, sends it to the OCR service and receives the result of the OCR processing.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrAgent.#ctor(System.String,Microsoft.Hawaii.ClientIdentity,System.Byte[],System.Object)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the OcrAgent class.
member.param: Specifies the host name of the OCR service.
Specifies a buffer containing an image that has to be processed. The image must be in JPEG format.
Specifies a user defined object which will be provided in the call to the "on complete" calback.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrAgent.GetPostData
member.summary: An overridden abstract method. It provides the POST (as in Http POST) data that has to be sent to the service. This method will be called by the base class when it needs data during a Http POST method call.
member.returns: The POST data as an array of bytes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrAgent.ParseOutput(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: An overridden abstract method. This method is called after the response sent by the server is received by the client.
member.param: The response stream containing response data that is received from the server.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrAgent.OnCompleteRequest
member.summary: An overriden method. It is invoked after completing the service request. It does some processing of the OCR service call result and it calls the client's "on complete" callback method.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrAgent.CreateServiceUri(System.String)
member.summary: It creates the service uri.
member.param: Specifies a host name of the service.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrAgent.ImageBuffer
member.summary: Gets the buffer containing the image that has to be processed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.OcrAgent.RequestContentType
member.summary: An overriden property to set the request content type to be Json.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Microsoft.Hawaii.Ocr.Client namespace provides classes that implement the client library that connects to the Hawaii OCR Service in order to perform character recognition.
